snippet: KAYE--Hon. Judith. Extraordinary jurist, humanitarian, friend. Her concern for children, families, victims of breast cancer will be perpetuated in the work that she initiated. We shall miss her forever. Sondra Miller 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Hon. Judith. Extraordinary jurist, humanitarian, friend. Her concern for children, families, victims of breast cancer will be perpetuated in the work that she initiated. We shall miss her forever. Sondra Miller 1/3
